BoolProperty.Name: IncludeInUnityFile
BoolProperty.Description: When set to true, the file will be #included into a unity file.

IntProperty.Name: OrderInUnityFile
IntProperty.Description: Files included in a unity file will be sorted using their order number.

BoolProperty.Name: CombineFilesOnlyFromTheSameFolder
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Combine Files Only From the Same Folder
BoolProperty.Description: If set to 'Yes', one unity file will only contain files from the same folder if the number of sources in the folder is more than 'Minimum Number of Sources in a Unity File'.

IntProperty.Name: MinFilesInUnityFile
IntProperty.DisplayName: Minimum Number of Sources in a Unity File
IntProperty.Description: Specifies minimum number of sources in one unity file.

IntProperty.Name: MaxFilesInUnityFile
IntProperty.DisplayName: Maximum Number of Sources in a Unity File
IntProperty.Description: Specifies maximum number of sources in one unity file. '0' means no limit.

IntProperty.Name: MinUnityFiles
IntProperty.Description: Specifies minimum number of unity files to generate if possible.

StringProperty.Name: AddCodeBeforeSourceInclude
StringProperty.DisplayName: Code Snippet To Add Before Include
StringProperty.Description: Code snippet to add to the unity file before including each source file. You can use the following macros: $$unity_id$$ - unique unity file hash $$file_number$$ - source file number in the unity file $$file_name$$ - source file name $$file_path$$ - source file full path $$project_name$$ - project name

StringProperty.Name: AddCodeAfterSourceInclude
StringProperty.DisplayName: Code Snippet To Add After Include
StringProperty.Description: Code snippet to add to the unity file after including each source file. You can use the following macros: $$unity_id$$ - unique unity file hash $$file_number$$ - source file number in the unity file $$file_name$$ - source file name $$file_path$$ - source file full path $$project_name$$ - project name

StringProperty.Name: AddCodeBeforeSourceIncludeFromFile
StringProperty.DisplayName: File Code Snippet To Add Before Include
StringProperty.Description: Code snippet to add to the unity file before including each source file.

StringProperty.Name: AddCodeAfterSourceIncludeFromFile
StringProperty.DisplayName: File Code Snippet To Add After Include
StringProperty.Description: Code snippet to add to the unity file after including each source file.

StringProperty.Name: UnityFilesDirectory
StringProperty.Description: The directory to create automatically generated unity files.

BoolProperty.Name: CustomUnityFile
BoolProperty.Description: Indicates custom unity file. If set to 'Yes' unity files will not be automatically generated.
